page.title: 18Spare Time in 1985, Norton
page.content: When indoors, especially in the winter months, the family spends a great part of its time watching television. Reading is very popular with Mother and the children. Father is usually engaged in work around the house, or using the computer with the children. The children spend a lot of time on the computer. Mother usually knits or sews. In the summer, Father likes sporting activities like jogging, bowls and snooker. He spends time in his garden. Mother likes outdoor activities, but mainly walking and gardening. The local keep fit class is also very popular. The children spend most of their time out doors riding their bicycles or playing with their friends. The "BMX" type of bike is very popular and boys very often construct makeshift courses on waste land.
